#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main() {
 // your code goes here
 int t;
 long n;
 scanf("%d", &t);
 while(t--) {
  scanf("%ld", &n);
  if(n%7==0) printf("%ld\n", n);
  else {
   while(n>0) { n=n-4; if(n%7==0) { printf("%ld\n", n); break; } }
   if(n%7!=0) printf("-1\n");
  }
 }
 return 0;
}
